content: I can feel this, really feel this. It took me to a few places I had forgotten existed. I began to see him in my mind’s eye again and had to shake it off while reading. I should have been done reviewing this minutes ago, but… when it’s good, and takes me to a place of depth, intensity, or pain… I kinda get stuck. You know this, though. All of this to say, thank you for sending this gem to us. It is indeed glorious.
